4308960.name: Heaven's Glaive
4308960.description:
Welcome to Heaven's Glaive. In this classic-styled RPG, you are one of the 5 protagonists leading your childhood friends on Quests and Adventures around the island.

  • Choose a protagonist: Each protagonist has a unique experience during the story that you won't necessarily see otherwise.

  • Turn-Based Combat: Combat is very easy to understand, but has a high mastery ceiling.

  • Exploration: Explore the island of Principium to locate hidden items or enemies.

  • Befriend Citizens: Helping Citizens will earn their favor, and will present you with discounts or leads to aid you in your questing activities.

  • Bounties: Track and Hunt down monsters causing problems for the Citizens of the Island.

DEMO PATCH 0.1.1d has been released!

Focused mainly on some visual updates/fixes with a few combat adjustments

New Features -Improved Text Clarity on signs

-Added revival function to the "Blue Chamomile" Item.

-Added new HUD & UI elements to battles.

-Added Pass actions to Arven, Luna and Tenshi

-Arven's pass action grants him an additional hit on his next attack as well as +1AP

-Luna's pass action grants a temporary WIS buff and +1AP -Tenshi's pass action adds 1 bullet to the chamber, and gives +1AP

-Added new sounds.

-Added new icons for stat buffs/debuffs.

Bugfixes

-Fixed some graphical issues/inconsistencies.

-Fixed several no-clipping issues.

-Fixed Roof/Tree noclip issue.

Adjustments

-Tenshi's Quickshot accuracy increased to 100%
